message:
Software Tester

· A Bachelor degree in computer science or related discipline.

· At least 1 year experience as a tester

· Good knowledge in preparing and automation of testing plans

· High attention to details

· Familiarity with bug tracking and collaborative development systems, e.g., Team Foundation Sever (TFS) and Microsoft Test Manager is a plus

· An ISTQB certificate is a plus

Job description:

· Testing web-based applications written in PHP against specification.

· Report bugs to developers via TFS with sufficient details to reproduce the bugs.

· Documenting testing scenario/cases that covers different types/level of testing
 
· Experience with reviewing requirements and developing test cases based on those requirements.

· Whitebox testing experience at the unit, integration and system levels.

· Strong written and verbal communication skills are a must.

· A good understanding of the software development process.

· A good understanding of the business approach.

· A good understanding of Software testing process and types.

· Must be able to multitask and meet deadlines in a fast-paced start-up environment.

· Attention to detail and strong problem-solving skills are critical.

Please Send CV to hr@boraqdigital.com with Job Title: Software tester
